me bima adu kalath hari mage liwime shakthiya aduunath hari...melo rahak naha.dan me liyuma liya liya inna atharema kol ekak aapi..."helo..kawda..?""aa..ohoma thama dan mathakath naha neda..api me oya haduwa pansala balanna kiyala kalekata passe aawa..."balinnan mage dahampasale mulma gola balayo tika..ada pansale katina pinkamalu...un tika kalekata passe pansal awith..ee aawa para mawa mathak wela kattiyath ekka mata kol karala...ara mama pansal kathawe dahampasale uganwanna giya welawe mata hamba wechcha mulma pirimi golayo dennek gana kiwwe...kattiyata mathakada manda anna ee dennath athuluwa set eka thamayi..aparade kiyanna baha..un adath eda wagema thamayi...ee athare thawa ekek baninawa..mama aawath hari thama eekata muna gahune naha kiyala..aththa thamayi anith kollo tikanan sarin sareta mama ee paththe giya welawata balala awith thiyenawa..eeth ara aadapali kiwwa eka hamba unema naha newa..monawa korannada ithin...ahagena hitiya dosmure..monawa unath mage kollo tika newa...pansal aawata mokada kastiyata echchara fit ekak nathuwa wage...un ee dawaswala wisthara kiyawanawa...happachchiye mewun tika ee dawaswala puduma nahillak nahune...dawasak mama budu geyi bima kaduwe irida dawasaka ude..me kollo tika ude daham pasalata andagena awith thibunu adum pitinma wadeta bassa..anthimata bima kadala shuddha karala gal kiyub thunak withara konkrit anala wade karanna awith hitiya basunnahalata athwada dila hawas wenakota mulu budu gebimama konkrit eka dala thamayi gedara giye..andum ganna deyak naha..simenthi badamayi..madayi...kohomath mata podi kollo tika puduma widiyata udaw kala...math hama welawema un tikata danna kiyana hama dema kiyala dunna...hama widiyakinma udaw kala...wibhaga kittu wenakota kattiyama pansale nawaththagena kanna bonna dila..
